name: Destroy all Robots
description:
Robots have overrun the facility, it's up to you to destroy them all.

'Requires a Xbox Controller/Gamepad & Play in Fullscreen'

Controls:
Left Analogue Stick: Move Player
Right Analogue Stick: Move Camera
A: Jump
X: Fire Gun
B: Throw Grenade
Y: Reload
Left + Right Bumper: Change Weapon
Start: Pause
